attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ASk that the Government provide enough monetery support for old people in need of care to get same free whether in their own home or in a care home. The NHS is supposed to be free at the point of use for ALL and the elderly shpuld not be expected to sell thier homes to obtaine the care they need.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
